placeholders.Camelot: Camelot is a large castle with a stone wall, iron gatehouse and a round table.
placeholders.Gallahad: Gallahad has curly brown hair, tanned skin and brown eyes.
placeholders.Mordred: Mordred has grey hair, green eyes, yellow skin and wears a red robe.
placeholders.KingArthur: King Arthur has short blonde hair, golden skin, blue eyes and a short beard.
placeholders.LadyOfTheLake: Lady of the Lake has long blonde hair, pale porcelein skin, and is slender yet curvaceous.
